ValidationRule.description: Cannot move the Case Stage for Initial Seed to Complete without Tracking Number
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support' && ISPICKVAL( Status, 'In Progress') && ISPICKVAL( Stage__c,'Complete' ) && ISBLANK( Tracking_ID__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add a Tracking Number before marking 'Initial Seed Stage' as Complete.
